Bungalow 52 guests will enjoy a home-away-from homestay with a state-of-the-art kitchen, indoor & outdoor dining spaces, a heated swimming pool & plenty of home entertainment.
The villa is serviced every weekday, so guests can enjoy the utmost privacy while still enjoying the perks of a luxury hotel.

The bungalow is set over 3 levels with its main split-level living area offering a comfortable lounge & dining area.  One level up you will find a state-of-the-art kitchen & main lounge that opens onto a covered deck with a heated pool, hammocks, sun loungers & outdoor shower.
The property has been designed for entertaining & relaxing.  There is a kitchenette in the lower entertainment lounge for preparing drinks & snacks as well as a home entertainment system complete with satellite television, retro turntable & Bose sound system.

title: CAMISSA HOUSE
description:
With the iconic Table Mountain as a backdrop, Camissa House celebrates uninterrupted views of the city & provides guests with one of the most sought-after locations in Cape Town.
Sister to the award-winning Manna Bay Hotel & Silvan Safari Lodge, Camissa House is a haven for boutique travellers from across the globe
Here guests will be spoilt with lofty high teas, in-room spa treatments & complimentary car services.  Yes, guests can use Camissa House’s cars to explore the city or drive to one of Cape Town’s award-winning restaurants.
Added luxuries include 24-hour butler services & in-room dining, as well as a beautiful rooftop bar & swimming pool deck where relaxing days can be spent soaking up the sun.

Camissa House features 8 individually styled rooms, each with a beautiful en-suite bathroom.  These include 3 luxury terrace rooms with sensational views of Cape Town & the surrounding area as well as 5 luxury rooms with spectacular mountain views.
The residence boasts a lounge, dining area, cosy library & TV room as well as a beautiful rooftop bar & swimming pool.

title: CAMPS BAY RETREAT
description:
Camps Bay Retreat, like the name suggests, is tucked away on a private estate, a stone throw away from fashionable Camps Bay, one of Cape Town’s most spectacular beaches.  
This luxurious boutique hotel offers a sanctuary for the mind & body in a tranquil, forested hideaway.
The retreat is located on the lower slopes of Lion’s Head & boasts spectacular views of the Atlantic Ocean & Table Mountain.  
Ideal for guests wanting a relaxing beach holiday, Camps Bay Retreat is the ideal base from which to explore some of Cape Town’s best beaches.  Only a short drive from the city centre with major tourist sites, the boutique hotel is perfect for guests wanting to get away from the hustle & bustle while still being close enough to explore Cape Town & surrounds.

Camps Bay Retreat consists of 3 buildings on the property:  The elegant Earl’s Dyke Manor, the contemporary Deck House, & the Villa, complete with stunning views of the surrounding forest & mountains.
Bright & spacious premier rooms are located on the first floor of all 3 houses & enjoy garden views.  Open-plan luxury rooms are situated in the Deck House.  They boast a private deck that overlooks the garden & mountains.  Elegant superior rooms offer luxurious bathrooms & spectacular views from a large, private deck.  The suites are located in all 3 houses.  They are very spacious & enjoy an extra lounge as well as a private deck with marvellous views of the garden or mountains.

title: CAPE CADOGAN
description:
Cape Cadogan is a modern, chic boutique hotel set in the heart of Cape Town, with Table Mountain, Devil’s Peak & Lions Head as the backdrop.  This Victorian-Georgian building dates back to the 1800s, & now a national monument, the interior boasts dramatic fabrics & antique furniture.
With a convenient location near the trendy Kloof Street, the hotel is an ideal base from which to explore Cape Town’s main tourist attractions, such as Table Mountain, Camps Bay & the V&A Waterfront.
For guests wishing to enjoy the ‘real’ Cape Town, Cape Cadogan is simply a must.  Set in a quiet street amongst the hustle & bustle of city life, it is easy to feel the heartbeat of the Mother City.

Cape Cadogan offers 15 luxurious en-suite rooms, beautifully furnished with antiques & contemporary décor to create a unique ‘Bohemian chic’ style.  
There are 7 classic rooms, 7 luxury rooms & 1 superior luxury suite.  Each room or suite features a beautiful en-suite bathroom & air-conditioning.  The luxury rooms have private terraces or courtyards & the superior luxury suite boasts a private plunge pool.
The main area boasts a comfortable lounge & cosy fireplace, the ideal place to unwind & read a book from the hotel’s library.  In summer, guests can enjoy Cape Cadogan’s large swimming pool while admiring the view of Table Mountain.
Guests can enjoy Cape Cadogan’s cooked & continental breakfasts in the elegant dining room overlooking the majestic gardens & swimming pool.

title: CAPE GRACE
description:
The luxurious Cape Grace boasts an excellent location in Cape Town’s V&A Waterfront, overlooking Table Mountain & the harbour.  
This 5-star hotel is a gracious sanctuary of sophistication & contemporary comfort.
Loyalty to guests is paramount at Cape Grace.  This is reflected in the luxurious spaciousness of guests’ rooms as well as the diverse spectrum of amenities & world-class service, ensuring an unforgettable stay.
Right on the hotel’s doorstep, guests can take their pick between browsing the shops, enjoying delicious food at one of Cape Town’s top restaurants or taking photos from the top of Table Mountain, the city’s most popular icon.

The Cape Grace consists of 120 individually decorated rooms & suites, reflecting a blend of modern luxury & traditional Cape culture.  
Each room or suite is elegant in style & generous in size, boasting iPod docking stations, fully stocked private bars & mini-delis as well as personally selected books from the library.  Elegant marble bathrooms are kitted out with luxurious Charlotte Rhys toiletries, a range exclusive to Cape Grace.
Families travelling with children can enjoy X-Box 360s in all the suites & penthouses.  The hotel’s restaurant, Signal brings you cuisine that is fresh & creative.  Besides the clear waters of the marina, The Bascule Bar provides the largest selection of whiskies south of the equator.
Cape Grace boasts a luxurious spa, a well-stocked library & a swimming pool where guests can relax after a busy day out.

title: CAPE VIEW CLIFTON
description:
Cape View Clifton is a secluded haven near the fashionable Clifton & Camps Bay beaches, offering sensational views of the mountain & ocean.
Centrally located within minutes of the city of Cape Town, the boutique hotel provides convenient access to many of the spectacular sights of the area – the Twelve Apostles, Lion’s Head, Signal Hill, Table Mountain, Kirstenbosch Gardens & Clifton’s very own Blue Flag beaches.
Camps Bay’s shops, sidewalk cafes, restaurants & nightlife are only a stone throw away.

Small & intimate, the boutique hotel boasts only 3 deluxe suites & 2 junior suites as well as a two-bedroom & 3-bedroom luxury self-catering apartment.
Each suite boasts a private, sea-facing balcony & gorgeous en-suite bathroom.
Communal spaces include a spacious living & dining area leading onto the pool deck where breathtaking views can be enjoyed.  There is also a well-equipped gym located on the property.

title: CLOUD NINE BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
With Table Mountain as the backdrop & trendy Kloof Street with its restaurants, bars, boutiques & cafes only a stone throw away, Cloud Nine Boutique Hotel offers a relaxed & vibrant experience in one of the most exciting cities in the world.
From its rooftop bar & splash pool, sensational views of Table Mountain can be enjoyed, so after a day of city exploration, guests can watch the sunset while sipping on a delicious cocktail.
Service is important at Cloud Nine.  Not only will friendly staff look after your daily needs & requirements, but renowned breakfasts have become a well-known tradition here, supplying a buffet feast or a full English breakfast.

Cloud Nine Boutique Hotel offers 55 luxury rooms, each equipped with designer bathrooms & modern amenities such as a Nespresso machine, air-conditioning & complimentary high-speed fibre Wi-Fi.
There are classic rooms, heritage classic rooms, heritage classic rooms with balconies, heritage deluxe rooms & heritage deluxe rooms with balconies.  Some rooms are larger than others, some have balconies & others boasts views of Table Mountain.
The spectacular rooftop restaurant & bar offer 360-degree views of the city & Table Mountain.  In addition, there are 2 on-site restaurants, a heated pool for hotel guests & a secluded courtyard.  
Other facilities include a spa with 2 treatment rooms, a hair salon & a sun deck.

title: COMPASS HOUSE
description:
The five-star boutique hotel, Compass House enjoys a spectacular setting in trendy Bantry Bay & boasts sensational views of the ocean from every room of the house.
Cape Town’s city centre is only a 10-minute drive away, so guests will have the added benefit of a 5-star beach experience that is away from the hustle & bustle of city life, yet close enough to many award-winning restaurants, boutique shops & top attractions.
The Atlantic Seaboard is one of the most beautiful & coveted areas of Cape Town.  Not only does it offer stunning views & easy beach access, but its sheltered location is a big drawcard for couples or families who want to enjoy the best of the city & beach life.

Small & intimate, this boutique-style hotel features only 5 air-conditioned suites – each boasting an en-suite bathroom & private patio or balcony offering glorious views of the ocean.
The 20-meter infinity pool invites guests to relax after a day of city exploration & the deck with its day salas & sun loungers is a wonderful place to end the day off with sundowners.  
There is also a cosy lounge should guests wish to unwind indoors with a good book.

title: DOCK HOUSE
description:
With a prime location in the heart of Cape Town’s V&A Waterfont, Dock House provides the perfect base from which to explore the city – while still maintaining the highest level of luxury & service.
Originally the Harbor Master’s 1800’s home, Dock House combines classic Victorian architecture with contemporary style.  The boutique offers only 6 suites & 24-hour butler service, both adding to the intimate & personal atmosphere.
Within walking distance, you will find some of Cape Town’s best restaurants, boutique shops & cafes – as well as the harbour with its many yachts & boats.  With Table Mountain as the backdrop, guests will be right at the centre of all Cape Town’s top attractions.

Accommodation comprises 5 luxury rooms & 1 luxury suite.
Each luxury room has been individually styled, but all share equal amounts of sophistication.  Three of the upstairs rooms have balconies with views of the bustling harbour at the V&A Waterfront & the ground floor room opens onto a veranda overlooking the groomed garden & swimming pool area.
One set of these rooms are inter-leading, making them an ideal choice for families.
The luxury suite is exceptionally opulent & opens up to a private, beautifully manicured courtyard garden.
Hotel facilities include a wellness spa, manicured gardens beside a sparkling swimming pool, a state-of-the-art fitness centre as well as a restaurant & bar.  Childminding services are available for those travelling with children.

title: ELLERMAN HOUSE
description:
Ellerman House is an elegant villa like no other.  Set on the mountainside, overlooking Bantry Bay, this boutique hotel offers exceptional service & exquisite accommodation.  
This historical mansion has been fully restored & lavishly decorated with South African art to create an opulent retreat, ideal for the discerning traveller.
A name famous in the Conde Nast circles, Ellerman House never fails to deliver.  Ideally located near Cape Town’s city centre, Table Mountain, Camps Bay & Clifton beaches as well as the popular V&A Waterfront – guests can easily explore Bantry Bay & its surrounds.

Ellerman House offers 13 individually styled rooms, all tastefully decorated with the most elegant fabrics & furnishings.  All rooms are equipped with under-floor heating, air-conditioning & complimentary room bars.  They all boast gorgeous views of the Atlantic Ocean.
Ellerman House is also home to 2 private, luxurious villas – ideal for guests travelling with family, looking for seclusion & privacy.  
Each villa has a sun-drenched pool deck overlooking the ocean, a personal butler, chef & staff.  One villa has 3 bedrooms & the other 5 bedrooms, both equipped with separate lounge, dining room & study.
At the main house, you will find a restaurant & bar as well as a library, gym, swimming pool & wellness spa.

title: GORGEOUS GEORGE BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
Gorgeous George Boutique Hotel is set in a beautifully restored historic building in the heart of Cape Town’s city centre & offers a range of cosy studios & larger suites to the sleek urban traveller.  
The hotel offers the perfect blend between art, innovative design & fine cuisine.  Within walking distance, you will find important landmarks such as Greenmarket Square & the Company Gardens.  Camps Bay & the V&A Waterfront are a short drive away.
The hotel’s coolest feature is their rooftop restaurant with pool, bar & comfortable lounging area.  From here, guests can enjoy some of the finest food in Cape Town, along with delicious cocktails & sensational views over the city below.
Artistic couples will be drawn to Gorgeous George’s studios that were designed for couples, but the hotel also offers 2-bedroom suites for groups or families.  They can arrange a cot for kids under 2 & even offers a convenient child-friendly buffet for little ones.

Gorgeous George offers 32 luxurious rooms with industrial tones of raw, exposed concrete & steelwork, blended with modern Victorian design elements.
These rooms include studios, one-bedroom suites & two-bedroom suites.
Each air-conditioned studio features a separate bathroom off the lounge with a lush walk-in rain shower.  The one-bedroom suites offer even more space than the studios & the two-bedroom suites are ideal for families travelling together.
Hotel facilities include a rooftop restaurant, bar, swimming pool & sun loungers – the ideal place to relax & enjoy breathtaking views over the city.

title: KENSINGTON PLACE
description:
Kensington Place is located within a quiet street high on the slopes of Table Mountain.  This intimate boutique hotel oozes luxury, elegance & outstanding attention to detail.  
Management will ensure that guests are not only looked after but receive exceptional service throughout their stay.
Idyllic for honeymooners, couples, or guests who require personalized service & intimacy, Kensington Place is a short drive away from all of Cape Town’s tourist sites, including Table Mountain, the V&A Waterfront & Camps Bay beach.

Kensington Place Boutique Hotel is all about style & privacy.  With only 8 individually decorated rooms, furnished with modernist Italian pieces, guests will be able to enjoy the peace & tranquillity only a small boutique hotel can offer.
Each luxurious bedroom consists of a lounge area & balcony overlooking the garden & majestic views of Table Mountain, city & ocean beyond.  Guests can also make use of their personal iPod docking station Wi-Fi laptop & large flat-screen TV.  All rooms enjoy underfloor heating & air conditioning.  The en suite bathroom has a rain shower & a huge sunken bathtub.
A sophisticated terrace with a plunge pool enjoys sweeping views of the twinkling lights by night & the beautiful Table Bay by day.  On a sunny day, breakfast is served on the sunny verandah & at night, drinks are enjoyed by the bar next to the cosy fireplace.

title: MANNA BAY
description:
Ever dreamt of experiencing luxury boutique living at its best?  Look no further because Manna Bay will exceed your expectations from beginning to end!
Located in the heart of Cape Town – quite literally adjacent to Table Mountain – guests will be blown away by the ideal setting of being so close to one of the world’s greatest landmarks.  A gate leads directly from Manna Bay’s grounds to the spectacular Table Mountain National Park.  You can’t get much closer than this!
Jaw-dropping views await you at the Manna Bay Café & Atlas Rooftop Bar where delicious cocktails are served while the sun is setting over the horizon.

Manna Bay is home to 8 individually styled rooms & suites, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
Some rooms have mountain views, others have city views & other boast garden views.  One of the rooms even has a private plunge pool – the ideal place to relax after a day of city exploration.
Manna Bay’s communal facilities include a fitness centre for guests wishing to stay active, a well-stocked library as well as a sparkling swimming pool & cocktail bar.

title: MORE QUARTERS
description:
More Quarters offers their guests exactly that….More.  
More space, more luxury & more personal service. Operating exactly like a hotel, guests will still enjoy the benefits of a hotel – including concierge, breakfast, daily cleaning & personal attention, while enjoying extra comforts like space & privacy.
More Quarters is ideal for families, groups or couples interested in a little bit more.  Guests will be able to choose between one & two-bedroom apartments as well as a three-bedroom villa, all set within a quiet haven close to the trendy Kloof Street.
More Quarters is located at the foot of majestic Table Mountain, within walking distance of restaurants, shops & boutiques to ensure a comfortable stay for guests who desire a measure of independence during their Cape Town holiday.

All luxury apartments consist of spacious living areas & modern, comfortable furnishings – offering a home-away-from-home feel.  Breakfast can be enjoyed at the hotel or in the comfort of your apartment.
The apartments all boast modern conveniences, such as air-conditioning, internet access, minibars & secure parking.  
Guests can relax in the hotel’s elegant lounge while the concierge arranges day trips, transfers, restaurant reservations & spa treatments.

title: MORUKURU BEACH LODGE
description:
Morukuru Beach Lodge is perched above the sun-bleached dunes of De Hoop Nature Reserve, offering sensational views over the unspoilt Indian Ocean coastline that plays host to migrating southern right whales between July & November each year.
During whale season, hundreds arrive to feed, breed & give birth & guests can easily see these amazing creatures from the comfort of land.
This tranquil sanctuary is one of South Africa’s most unique & off-the-beaten-track wildlife destinations & attracts visitors who would like to extend their Cape Town stay.

Morukuru Beach Lodge offers a boutique-style beach experience.  Comprising of only 5 elegant suites, guests can enjoy an intimate & personalized stay.
The suites consist of a honeymoon suite, 2 ocean-view suites & 2 ocean view family suites, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
The honeymoon suite boasts floor to ceiling doors offering views of the surrounding fynbos covered dunes, as well as a partial view of the ocean.  The suite also has indoor & outdoor sitting areas, as well as a fireplace.  Outside, you will find a large deck with an outdoor bathtub & comfortable sun loungers.
The ocean-view suites boast beautiful ocean views & their en-suite bathrooms include a separate bath & shower.  Families will be comfortable in the ocean view family suites that can accommodate 2 adults & 2 children under 16, sharing with the parents.
The main beach house hosts a dining room, bar, library, hot tub & swimming pool.

title: NOX APARTMENTS &amp; VILLAS
description:
Nox Apartments & Villas provides luxury serviced accommodation in exclusive homes & villas in one of Cape Town’s most sought-after areas:   The beautiful Atlantic Seaboard.  
All properties are located near Cape Town’s best beaches or attractions, including Clifton, Camps Bay, Bantry Bay as well as the V&A Waterfront, De Waterkant & Cape Town City Bowl.
Ideal for groups, families or couples who enjoy spacious living & privacy, Nox Apartments & Villas is the perfect match.  
Guests will experience a luxury home-away-from-home stay while still enjoying the added benefits of a hotel, like daily housekeeping, concierge facilities as well as tourist information.
Table Mountain & the V&A Waterfront are only a short ride away by taxi.  Nox provides their guests with luxury, space & privacy – & can assist with personalized arrangements such as chefs, babysitters & grocery shopping.

Guests can choose between luxury one, two, three, four or five-bedroom apartments or villas in the heart of Cape Town.  Each apartment or villa consists of a lounge, dining room, balcony or terrace & some have swimming pools.
All homes are individually decorated & furnished, each different in style.

title: O ON KLOOF BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
O on Kloof is set within the exclusive residential Atlantic Seaboard neighbourhood of Bantry Bay - quite central to Cape Town’s premier beaches & top attractions like Table Mountain & the V&A Waterfront.
One of Tatler’s Top 101 Hotels in the World & awarded TripAdvisor’s Travelers Choice Award in 2021, O on Kloof delivers exceptional service, stylish décor & sophisticated ambience.
Couples & honeymooners are particularly drawn to O on Kloof since they offer a range of romantic on-site facilities, like an indoor pool, a wellness spa, an exclusive gym & a cocktail bar.  
Upon arrival, guests will also receive a 30-minute complimentary neck, foot or back massage – something unique to O on Kloof.

Accommodation comprises 2 standard rooms, 4 luxury rooms & 2 suites, each equipped with air-conditioning & en-suite bathroom.
One of the standard rooms have a bath & shower & the other is located downstairs by the pool & shares a communal deck.  
All luxury rooms either have a private balcony or shared deck & boast a bath & shower.  One of these rooms offers beautiful views of Lion’s Head.
Offering beautiful sea views, the suites offer the best in O on Kloof luxury & come complete with a private balcony or deck, as well as a hammock & jacuzzi.  Both suites offer ocean views, while one also offers views of Lion’s Head.
Communal facilities include an indoor pool, wellness spa, restaurant, bar, library & fitness centre.

title: ONE &amp; ONLY CAPE TOWN
description:
Everyone is familiar with the One & Only.  One of the city’s best hotels, One & Only Cape Town is located within the heart of the famous V&A Waterfront & offers sophisticated flair close to the city’s top attractions.
Table Mountain provides a spectacular natural backdrop & on your doorstep, you will find world-class shopping, award-winning restaurants & the beautiful V&A harbour with its stylish yachts & colourful fishing boats.
One & Only guests will enjoy the perks of their award-winning spa that offers a range of innovative treatments & also experience one of the best culinary feasts in Cape Town from their 2 on-site restaurants.

The One and Only Cape Town features a total of 133 spacious rooms and suites, decorated with elegant fabrics and unique furnishings.
All rooms have air-conditioning & en-suite facilities.
In addition to the wellness spa & 2 restaurants, the hotel also offers a relaxation zone, a beauty salon & a Kids Club where the little ones can have fun.  Even teenagers are catered for with a wide selection of computer games & adrenalin-pumping activities around the city.
Communal areas include a sparkling swimming pool, cocktail bar & fitness centre for those wishing to stay active.

title: POD BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
The chic & stylish POD Boutique Hotel boasts a spectacular setting a few steps from the beach along Camps Bay’s strip with its trendy restaurants, cafes & bars.
This Soho-style beach house offers clean lines, infinity pools & huge sliding doors to invite the beach & mountain in.  
Only a few steps away from the beach, POD Boutique Hotel is the ideal base to explore the hustle & bustle of the vibrant city from a more relaxing point of view.  
Table Mountain & other top attractions are only a 10-minute drive away, so after a day of exploration, guests can return to their beachfront haven & enjoy the tranquil sound of the waves while watching the sunset.

POD offers a range of different rooms, giving guests the option to choose an experience that suits them best.  Accommodation comprises 17 rooms in total, including mini-mountain rooms, mountain rooms, luxury rooms, classic rooms & deluxe rooms.  
Mini mountain rooms & mountain rooms are compact & offer glorious views of the mountain but have no balconies.  Luxury & classic rooms offer private plunge pools & a large patio with mountain & partial sea views while the extremely spacious deluxe rooms have a living area & uninterrupted beach views.
Hotel facilities include a cocktail bar, lap pool, gym with cardio & weight training equipment & a late departure lounge or shower room.

title: QUEEN VICTORIA HOTEL
description:
The sophisticated Queen Victoria Hotel is situated within a precinct of heritage buildings along the main road leading to Cape Town’s V&A Waterfront.
Offering the perfect base from which to explore the city, the hotel is within walking distance to the V&A Waterfront’s top attractions as well as a host of fine dining restaurants, art galleries & boutiques.
What makes the hotel so special, is that while it enjoys a prime location in the heart of vibrant Cape Town, it is a little removed from the main crowds, so after a day of city exploration, guests can return to a quiet slice of paradise in the middle of the hustle & bustle.
Table Mountain, Clifton & Camps Bay beaches are only a short drive away & right next door you will find the Sanctuary Spa that offers a range of innovative treatments.

The Queen Victoria Hotel is home to 15 deluxe rooms, 17 premium rooms & 3 suites.
The deluxe rooms are wonderfully spacious and afford guests a luxurious stay, with a range of comforts and top-class amenities.  The premium rooms are similar, but additionally, boast stunning views of Table Mountain &/the harbour.
An exclusive annexe to the hotel – The Manor House – has 3 private, luxury suites & come complete with private bars & butler services.  These suites feature private patios or Juliet balconies, offering captivating views of Table Mountain.  Guests staying in The Manor House will also have access to a private dining room, designer spa, state-of-the-art gym & a pool nestled in a beautiful, manicured garden.
Facilities at Queen Victoria include a fitness centre, swimming pool, wellness spa, restaurant & cocktail bar.

title: RADISSON BLU HOTEL WATERFRONT
description:
At the edge of the Atlantic Ocean, overlooking a private marina, you will find Radisson Blu Hotel Waterfront.  
Offering an ideal base from which to explore vibrant Cape Town, the hotel is situated just a short walk away from the V&A Waterfront with its many cafes, restaurants & boutiques.
Capetonians will know that Tobago’s Bar & Terrace has become one of the best sunset spots in the city.  Here views extend out past Robben Island, so guests are invited to enjoy this ocean-front haven with a cocktail in hand.
A short drive away, the majestic Table Mountain welcomes you to the most beautiful city in South Africa.

The hotel offers 177 rooms – including standard rooms, standard sea view rooms, superior rooms with balcony, premium rooms with balcony (sea view), junior suites with balcony (sea view), 2-bedroom suites & family rooms with terrace (sea view). 
All rooms offer air-conditioning & en-suite facilities.
Radisson Blue Hotel Waterfront features a large pool terrace containing a rim-flow swimming pool that overlooks the ocean as well as a restaurant, cocktail bar, fitness centre & wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.

title: ROVOS RAIL
description:
Rovos Rail offers a luxury train holiday like no other.  
Apart from owning & operating the most luxurious trains in the world, Rovos Rail offers guests a variety of train journeys - each ranging from 2 nights to 2 weeks.
Short train trips include travelling from Cape Town to Pretoria or north to the majestic Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe.  The longest & most famous route is an epic rail journey that starts in Cape Town & passes through some of Africa’s most magnificent scenery to Dar es Salaam.
Elegant train carriages, spacious suites & fine dining is what the Rovos Rail journeys are all about.  For many guests, a real highlight of their Rovos experience is the 4-course suave dinners – a jacket-&-tie affair that never disappoints.
Everything is included in a Rovos Rail journey – all meals, drinks, snacks, high teas & even off-train activities & excursions, so guests can sit back & relax in style.
Rohan Vos started Rovos Rail in 1989 (hence the name) & is still very much involved in the company, endeavouring to personally welcome every guest arriving & departing from Rovos’ private train station in Pretoria.

Rovos Rail boasts 3 suite types that are the perfect balance between vintage carriages & modern luxury.  Pullman suites are 7 sq meters, Deluxe suites are 10 sq meters & Royal Suites are 16 sq meters.
All suites have fittings & furnishings of the highest standard & include en-suite bathrooms with a shower, toilet, basin & bath (Royal suites only).
The observation car seats 32 passengers & comprises an open-air balcony, big pictures windows, a bar, sofas & booths.

title: TABLE BAY HOTEL
description:
The stylish Table Bay Hotel enjoys a prime location within Cape Town’s picturesque working harbour & offers guests direct access to the V&A Waterfront with its trendy boutiques, cafes & restaurants.
The hotel has a nautical feel that is similar to some of the great cruise liners & grand hotels around the world.  
With Table Mountain as the backdrop & the harbour on your doorstep, it is quite wonderful to observe ships come & go from the front of the hotel. 
The Table Bay Hotel offers a wonderful base from which to explore the vibrant city of Cape Town.  Only a few minutes away, the majestic Table Mountain welcomes you to South Africa’s most beautiful city & a little further afield, you will find the beautiful Clifton & Camps Bay beaches.

Each of the 329 luxury hotel rooms enjoys uninterrupted sea-facing views across the working Victoria and Alfred harbour to Table Mountain, or over the Atlantic Ocean to Robben Island. 
Hotel facilities include a heated saltwater pool, a boutique gym where guests can work up a sweat & a health spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.  
The hotel also features an on-site restaurant & bar should guests wish to enjoy a relaxing evening in the comfort of the hotel.

title: TAJ CAPE TOWN
description:
The impeccably restored Taj Cape Town pays tribute to its former glory as the South African Reserve Bank & other historic buildings that were constructed in the 1890s.
Located in the centre of the old city, guests are within walking distance to the Company Gardens, St George’s Cathedral & Greenmarket Square as well as an eclectic array of restaurants, shops & galleries.
A short drive away, you will find the V&A Waterfront, the iconic Table Mountain & Cape Town’s most renowned beaches: Clifton & Camps Bay.
The hotel offers a variety of exceptional dining experiences, from afternoon tea in The Lobby Lounge to Bombay Brasserie, their all-day fine dining Indian restaurant.

The 176 rooms at Taj Cape Town are spread across 2 heritage buildings & all boast spectacular city views or overlook the majestic Table Mountain. The stylish bathrooms are en-suite & include delectable bath & body care products.
One & two-bedroom suites are available to discerning couples or families in need of a little more space.
Taj Cape Town is home to Jiva Grande Spa – the first of its kind in Africa. Here guests can enjoy a range of traditional Indian treatments or spend time at the fitness centre & heated indoor pool.
There is also a cosy library, cocktail bar & a variety of super on-site restaurants.

title: THE BAY HOTEL
description:
The Bay Hotel is situated on the trendy Victoria Road in one of Cape Town’s most prestigious beach towns, Camps Bay.  
Located at the foot of the majestic Twelve Apostles mountain range, with views of the Atlantic Ocean, the hotel enjoys a beautiful backdrop & is a mere stone’s throw from the beach.
On your doorstep, you will find a palm-fringed white, sandy beach lined with slick restaurants & trendy cocktail bars where most evenings are spent while watching the sunset.
The Bay Hotel is the ideal spot from which to enjoy Camps Bay’s laid-back beach atmosphere while still being close enough to explore Cape Town, Table Mountain & other top attractions.

Accommodation at The Bay Hotel consists of a variety of room types, all decorated in muted tones.  These include mountain rooms, classic & club classic rooms, premier rooms, cabana rooms, luxury rooms, suites & an opulent penthouse.
The mountain rooms enjoy beautiful views of the mountain while the classic & club classic rooms offer direct access to the pool from a private patio.  Premier rooms have either mountain & pool views or glorious ocean views & the cabana rooms have direct access to 2 cabana pools.
Luxury rooms are sea-facing, boasting private loungers, expansive balconies & spa baths.  The elegant suites have sea views, luxurious spa baths spacious living areas while the opulent penthouse boasts a private dining room & offers spectacular views of Camps Bay beach.

title: THE CAPE MILNER
description:
Set at the foot of Cape Town’s iconic Table Mountain, The Cape Milner is a slick boutique hotel that offers guests an ideal base from which to explore South Africa’s most beautiful city.
Attractions such as the V&A Waterfront, Company’s Gardens & Table Mountain Cableway are all mere minutes away.  With the mountain on your doorstep, guests can take an adventurous cable car ride up the mountain, hike to its peak or get a bird’s eye view from a helicopter.
The hotel also offers guests a complimentary shuttle between the city centre & the V&A Waterfront – a convenient cherry-on-top to any holiday.

The Cape Milner has 45 standard rooms, 10 luxury rooms & 2 executive suites. 
The standard rooms enjoy beautiful views of the Cape mountains, including that of renowned Table Mountain.  In addition, the luxury rooms also have foot spas, coffee machines & iPod docking stations.  Executive suites are larger & include lounge areas & private balconies.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar, swimming pool & gym.

title: THE CLARENDON BANTRY BAY
description:
At the foot of Lion’s Head in a secluded, ocean-facing enclave of Bantry Bay, lies an elegant boutique hotel that offers only the best in barefoot city luxury:  The Clarendon Bantry Bay.
Ideal for discerning travellers, this quiet retreat is just minutes away from the popular V&A Waterfront with its stylish cafes, restaurants & shops while Cape Town’s most beautiful beaches – Clifton & Camps Bay – are only a stone’s throw away.
The boutique hotel offers breathtaking views over the Atlantic Ocean & is sheltered from the summer winds, making this a wonderful choice for guests who want a little seclusion & tranquillity after a busy day or city exploration.
Complimentary High Tea is served each day & friendly staff will ensure that all your needs & requirements are looked after.

There are 13 rooms & suites at The Clarendon Bantry Bay, all equipped with air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.  Accommodation comprises standard rooms, superior rooms, superior suites & Clarendon Suites.  
The standard rooms are stylishly decorated & have partial or no sea views while the spacious superior rooms offer partial or full sea views.  Superior suites have private patios or balconies & beautiful ocean views while elegant Clarendon Suites boast uninterrupted views of the Atlantic Ocean.
Facilities at The Clarendon Bantry Bay include an on-site restaurant, a mini spa & a refreshing swimming pool.

title: THE LAST WORD CONSTANTIA
description:
Constantia is the Cape’s oldest wine-producing region & one of Cape Town’s most beautiful suburbs.  It is here, amid elegant vineyards that you will find The Last Word Constantia – an intimate boutique hotel that offers only the best in city luxury.
The Last Word Constantia not only offers an in-house chauffeur service & elegant rooms, but its fantastic location near award-winning wine estates is a big drawcard for discerning travellers from around the globe.

Accommodation comprises 9 spacious en-suite rooms consisting of 2 elegant suites, 2 pool suites, 1 family suite & 4 superior suites.
Each well-appointed suite offers luxurious touches such as underfloor heating, air-conditioning & complimentary tea & coffee.
Communal areas include a sparkling swimming pool with a surrounding lounge deck that has been carefully landscaped & sunk below ground level.  There is also a well-stocked library, cocktail bar & elegant restaurant that serves delicious breakfast feasts.  Dinners & lunches are available by prior arrangement.

title: THE LAST WORD LONG BEACH
description:
With an unbeatable location on a long stretch of white, sandy beach in the picturesque seaside village of Kommetjie, The Last Word Long Beach will quite literally take your breath away.
Not only will you see a spectacularly beautiful beach right on your doorstep, but guests can walk straight from their elegant suite onto the unspoilt dunes of Long Beach.
This small & intimate luxury boutique hotel is available on an individual daily-room basis or as an entire villa to share with your family or friends.
Breathtaking views of Hout Bay & Table Mountain are the cherry on top – along with a very convenient in-house chauffeur service.  
The area will provide guests with an off-the-beaten-track experience away from the hustle & bustle, yet only a 40-minute drive away from Cape Town - South Africa’s most beautiful city.

With only 6 stylish suites, The Last Word Long Beach provides only the best in barefoot beach luxury.  Accommodation comprises 2 elegant suites that are located upstairs as well as 1 junior suite & 3 superior double suites downstairs.
From the comfort of each suite, guests can enjoy endless views of the Atlantic Ocean ahead and the Chapman's Peak mountains beyond.
The elegant suites include a separate lounge area & a private ocean-facing balcony.  On the lower level, you will find a junior suite with a separate lounge area & a separate bath & shower.  Each of the superior double suites has a private patio & separate bath & shower.
Facilities at The Last Word Long Beach include a swimming pool, bar, library & nearby gym.

title: THE MARLY BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
Situated in the beautiful Camps Bay – Cape Town’s most sought-after & neighbourhood – The Marly is a boutique hotel that provides only the best in barefoot beach luxury.
The Marly offers some of the most jaw-dropping views in the area!  Not only will guests be able to enjoy uninterrupted ocean & mountain views from the swimming pool, the 80-seater bar & the sun terrace – but also every suite.
Overlooking the trendy Camps Bay beach with its cafes, restaurants & bars, makes this an ideal choice for the discerning traveller who wants to enjoy a relaxed beach holiday, but still be close enough to some of Cape Town’s top attractions.
Exceptional service is important at The Marly.  24-Hour room service is available & bath butlers will prepare a relaxing bath for guests each night, using a blend of essential oils & bubbles.

Small & intimate, this boutique hotel features only 11 suites – each offering jaw-dropping views of either the ocean or mountain.
All suites are equipped with en-suite bathrooms & rain showers, most suites have private balconies & one suite also comes with a jacuzzi.
On-site facilities include a sparkling swimming pool, gym, library & wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.  Their ocean-front Japanese restaurant serves delicious cuisine in a relaxed beachside setting.  There is also an 80-seater bar with an outside terrace which boasts some of the best ocean views in Camps Bay.

title: THE ONE ABOVE
description:
Welcome to Cape Town’s most sophisticated penthouse.  The One Above’s location cannot be closer to perfect – atop the One & Only Cape Town, with unobstructed views of Table Mountain, Robben Island, Devil’s Peak, Lion’s Head, the Cape Town Harbor & the V&A Waterfront.
The One Above offers everything you could wish for – from a private butler & chef team, a wrap-around entertainment deck with 2 swimming pools to an exquisite wine loft with 280 vintages.  The penthouse also has a private gym & sauna.
The One Above is the ideal choice for discerning travellers who understand & appreciate luxury & attention to detail.  It is perfect for business or pleasure, for families of all ages or friends travelling together.  A private butler & chef team will take care of your every need.
On your doorstep, you will find a city full of amazement.  Guests are a stone’s throw away from Table Mountain, the V&A Waterfront with its trendy shops, cafes & restaurants & other top attractions.  The blue flag beaches of Camps Bay & Clifton are only a short drive away.

The penthouse consists of 4 stylish suites, each with an en-suite bathroom.  The expansive master suite features an elegant sitting area with a fireplace, a dressing room & double en-suite bathrooms.  The 3 other spacious suites have private balconies overlooking the iconic Table Mountain & the lavish en-suite bathrooms boast enormous bathtubs, showers & marble fittings.
The penthouse offers several indoor & outdoor dining areas, a roof-top entertainment area with 2 swimming pools, 2 sun-flooded living rooms, a private gym with a sauna & steam room as well as a cosy library with a fireplace.  There is also a large & well-appointed kitchen with state-of-the-art equipment.

title: THE SILO
description:
Architectural imagination turned what was once the elevator portion of a historic grain silo complex into one of Cape Town’s most magnificent luxury hotels.  
The Silo sits above the Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa, which aims to have the largest collection of modern African art in the world & hotel guests will have direct access to this artistic slice of paradise.  The V&A Waterfront with its boutique shops, cafes & restaurants is within walking distance.
The hotel is constructed from glass panels & steel & at night, is transformed into a glowing beacon in the working harbour.
Captivating views of Table Mountain & Signal Hill confirms that Cape Town is, without a doubt, South Africa’s most beautiful city.

The Silo offers a personalized boutique hotel experience & with only 28 individually styled rooms & suites, guests will receive all the attention they deserve.
Rooms range from standard rooms to royal suites, as well as an elegant penthouse with triple aspect views of Table Mountain, the harbour & the Atlantic Ocean.
The hotel features a rooftop swimming pool, a wellness spa & a fitness centre as well as a cosy library, bar & restaurant serving superb fine dining cuisine.

title: THE SPA HOUSE
description:
The Spa House is an exclusive private villa set in leafy Hout Bay of the Cape Peninsula’s Atlantic seaboard.
This award-winning villa with avant-garde eco-design offers the perfect blend between marble, glass & timber to maximize its captivating mountain & forest views.
It is the ultimate mountainside retreat with a picture-perfect setting.  Located only a 20-minute drive from the glittering lights of Cape Town, The Spa House offers a secluded haven away from the hustle & bustle of city life – yet still close enough to explore Table Mountain, the V&A Waterfront or one of Cape Town’s blue flag beaches.  
On your doorstep, you will find attractions such as Chapman’s Peak Drive & the beautiful Constantia Wine Route.  Their on-site wellness spa features a salt bath, sauna, steam room & indoor jacuzzi, so guests are invited to put up their feet & get pampered after a day of city exploration.

Built over several levels to provide complete privacy, this 3-bedroom villa has a heated, 3m deep infinity pool.  The lower level houses the underground ‘underwater’ spa, which has large windows to the pool that allows a mesmerizing view of passing swimmers
Each of the 3 bedrooms has an elegant en-suite bathroom & beautiful views. 
There is also an open-plan living & dining area complete with a wooden deck & relaxing sun loungers.  The Spa House is surrounded by lush indigenous vegetation, manicured gardens & gorgeous views of the mountain & valley.  In addition to the giant outdoor extra deep swimming pool, kids also have their own pool.

title: TINTWALO ATLANTIC
description:
Perched above the Atlantic Ocean at the base of Chapman’s Peak, Tintswalo Atlantic offers a luxurious beachfront retreat with uninterrupted ocean views.  
Set just outside Cape Town, the lodge is built in a secluded cranny, offering romantics & honeymooners a true ocean paradise.
Located only 20 minutes from Cape Town’s city centre, this boutique hotel is the perfect base from which to explore the city, as well as Camps Bay, Clifton & Llandudno beaches.  
The lodge is built to blend seamlessly with the natural environment, ensuring optimum views of the sea & natural surroundings.  Right in front of the lodge, guests can take a stroll down a pebbled beach – or drive out to the nearby sandy, main beach in the quaint fishing town of Hout Bay.

Tintswalo Atlantic boasts 11 suites, each authentically designed & decorated to reflect elements of different well-known islands around the world, keeping to the lodge’s relaxed, yet sophisticated beach theme.
Suites all enjoy incredible views of the Atlantic Ocean & offer supreme comfort & privacy.  All suites are equipped with air-conditioning & lavish furnishes.  En-suite bathrooms boast double basins & showers.
The long wooden deck offers spectacular views of the ocean.  It is here where guests enjoy a meal, watch the sunset with a cocktail in hand, or unwind in the jacuzzi with a glass of bubbly.  
Deep sofas & comfortable chairs in the lounge invite you to relax after dinner.  The lodge is also home to a cocktail bar & wine cellar that offers an extensive range of local wines.

title: TWELVE APOSTLES HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
Perched high on the slopes of Table Mountain, you will find one of Cape Town’s most prestigious retreats, the Twelve Apostles Hotel & Spa.  With uninterrupted views of the sparkling Atlantic Ocean, it is no wonder that guests travel from around the world to come & unwind here.
Surrounded by hectares of indigenous fynbos & the Twelve Apostles mountain range, the hotel is ideal for honeymooners & discerning couples who want to get away from the hustle & bustle of the city, while still being close enough to explore the major sites.  
Apart from their prestigious spa, one of the highlights for guests is nature trails & picnic spots that lie behind the hotel & the exclusive-use gazebos that are perfect for sunset massages.

The Twelve Apostles Hotel & Spa offer a variety of rooms with sea or mountain views & are decorated in a beautiful chic designer style.  All rooms are equipped with beautiful, spacious bathrooms.  A romantic turndown service is offered to honeymooners.
Classic rooms have balconies where guests can enjoy a cup of coffee.  Mountain-facing rooms enjoy awe-inspiring views of the Twelve Apostles’ peaks & luxury rooms have views of either the sea or mountain.  The superior sea-facing rooms have balconies that open out onto the Atlantic Ocean & garden suites or one-bedroom mountain & sea-facing suites are ideal for guests travelling with children.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar, library & gym as well as a wellness spa & Kids Club.

title: THE VICTORIA &amp; ALFRED HOTEL
description:
A better location is hard to find.  The Victoria & Alfred Hotel is set in Cape Town’s ever-popular V&A Waterfront.  Named after this area, The Victoria & Alfred Hotel enjoys beautiful views of Cape Town’s most iconic sight, Table Mountain & the marina.
Right on your doorstep, you will find a variety of Cape Town’s top restaurants, cafes & boutiques – a true shopper’s delight.  The hotel boasts a safe & central location, offering guests the opportunity to explore the area on foot as most of Cape Town’s popular sights are within walking distance.

The Victoria & Alfred Hotel has a variety of room types to choose from.  Piazza-facing rooms enjoy tranquil views over the hotel’s piazza.  Mountain-facing rooms boast marvellous views over majestic Table Mountain & sophisticated lofts are located on the third floor – all stylishly decorated with a splash of elegance.
The Victoria & Alfred Hotel boasts luxury amenities that include designer spa & treatment rooms plus state-of-the-art gym facilities.  A sparkling swimming pool is set in a beautifully manicured garden along with a pool bar & outdoor dining area.

title: CANELANDS BEACH CLUB &amp; SPA
description:
The laidback Canelands Beach Club & Spa boasts a spectacular location overlooking the beach at Salt Rock on the subtropical Kwazulu-Natal coast.  
The charming town of Ballito is nearby & King Saka International Airport is only a 15-minute drive away, making this an ideal base from which to explore the surrounding area or as an overnight stay en route to the Battlefields or Phinda Game Reserve.
The hotel boasts awe-inspiring ocean views from the deck & offers guests direct access to a gorgeous, sandy beach.  
Food & drinks can be served directly on the beach, so guests can enjoy relaxing lunches from the comfort of their sun loungers.  This is luxury beachfront living at its best.

Canelands Beach Club & Spa features 10 luxury rooms, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.  There are include 6 standard garden rooms, 2 superior rooms & 2 deluxe suites.
The garden rooms are located downstairs, while the superior rooms & deluxe suites are located upstairs, both of which offer uninterrupted sea views.
Hotel facilities include a large deck, a 25m infinity pool with sun loungers, a comfortable lounge & a wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.

title: TEREMOK MARINE LODGE
description:
Teremok Marine Lodge is situated in beautiful Umhlanga, one of the most popular beach destinations on Durban’s north coast.
Located near a handful of excellent swimming beaches & within driving distance of popular attractions like uShaka Marine World & Gateway shopping complex, Teremok is an ideal base from which to explore the surrounding area.
This 5-star boutique hotel offers exceptional service, individually decorated suites & a wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments, making this a wonderful choice for honeymooners or romantics who are looking for a little luxury & pampering.

All 8 suites are unique in design & feature air-conditioning, private balconies & en-suite bathrooms with large rain showers & freestanding baths.
There is a communal lounge & bar area where guests can relax, as well as a well-stocked library with books & magazines.  Teremok Marine’s wellness spa specializes in mineral salt scrubs & body massages to leave you truly rejuvenated.  
Other hotel facilities include a sparkling swimming pool, fitness centre & hair/beauty salon.

title: THE OYSTER BOX
description:
The stylish Oyster Box is perched on the edge of the Indian Ocean & offers discerning travellers an elegant retreat close to many of Durban’s top attractions.
The hotel is a fusion of old-world charm & modern-day convenience, boasting 2 swimming pools (one with an ocean view & the other one in the gardens that is for over 12’s only), a spa with jacuzzi & hammam as well as a fully-equipped fitness centre.
The cherry on top is that guests can enjoy direct access to the beach with essentials like umbrellas, beach bags, toys & even sun protection lotion.  
Afternoon High Teas are an affair to remember.  An indulgent feast of cakes, pastries & sandwiches awaits each day between lunch & dinner.  In the evenings, guests can retreat to the 24-seater cinema & watch a classic movie while eating fresh popcorn.

The Oyster Box us 98 well-appointed rooms, all with air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.
Rooms include garden villa lofts & classic garden facing rooms looking out over the hotel’s lush & tranquil gardens while classic sea-facing rooms & luxury sea-facing rooms have balconies that overlook Umhlanga’s iconic lighthouse & beautiful coastline.  
Sea facing cabanas are situated on the lower ground level with individual terraces & offer stunning views of the water’s edge while sea-facing luxury suites boast separate lounge areas & glorious views of the Indian Ocean.  In addition, sea-facing deluxe suites include private plunge pools.
Sea facing family rooms consist of 2 bedrooms & each superior garden villa has a private plunge pool, terrace, lounge & bar.  The presidential suite is split over 2 levels & offers only the best in beachfront luxury.
Hotel facilities include a private cinema, 2 swimming pools, 3 restaurants, a gym, spa, library, bar & Kids Club.

title: ZIMBALI RESORT
description:
Zimbali Resort is situated inside the elite Zimbali Coastal Estate on the beautiful Dolphin Coast in Kwazulu-Natal.
The resort boasts sensational views of the Indian Ocean & offers its guests a 5-star service with the greatest attention to detail.  
Home to 2 swimming pools, a wellness spa, a fully equipped gym & a variety of restaurants, guests will be kept entertained for hours on end.  There is also a golf course & floodlit tennis courts for those wishing to stay active.
Zimbali Resort is a wonderful option for families since parents & children will have their pick at an array of land & water-based activities.  Babysitters are also available on request.
Zimbali is located within 5km from the bustling town of Ballito, 26km from Umhlanga, 35km from Durban & only 16km from King Shaka International Airport.

This beachfront hotel features 154 rooms & suites & villas, all offering stunning views of the Indian Ocean, oversized verandas & elegant décor of stone, wood & earth tones inspired by the area’s breathtaking natural surroundings.
Resort facilities include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a spa, a gym, a golf course, floodlit tennis courts, a bar & a variety of indoor & outdoor dining options.

title: LAKE VICTORIA SERENA RESORT
description:
Lake Victoria Serena Resort enjoys a prime location on Lake Victoria between Kampala & Entebbe, making it the idea overnight stop before or after a gorilla trekking expedition.
The resort has been designed to echo a Roman villa.  With studded fountains, mosaics & manicured rose gardens, the Serena has several restaurants & bars, sporting facilities like tennis & volleyball courts, babysitting services & a fully equipped spa.

Lake Victoria Serena consists of deluxe suites, executive suites & 2 presidential suites.  
The deluxe suites are appointed with a seating area, workstation, balcony & a lavish en-suite marble bathroom with a walk-in shower.
The executive suites boasts spectacular views over the golf course & Lake Victoria & is ideal for guests in search of secluded spacious living.
The 2 presidential suites are located on the penthouse level of the main citadel with beautiful views over the lake & championship golf course.  Each suite includes a dining room (with a private kitchen), a furnished terrace & staff accommodation to ensure 24-hour service.  
All suites include 24-hour room service.
The facilities at Serena Lake Victoria include a wellness spa that is adjacent to the suny pool deck, a state-of-the-art gym & cardio studio, swimming pool as well as tennis & volleyball courts.
Babysitting services & Kids meals can also be arranged.

title: LATITUDE 0 DEGREES
description:
Latitude 0 Degrees sits among indigenous orchid-filled trees atop of Makindye Hill, boasting breathtaking views over Lake Victoria & the city of Kampala.
With a convenient location only 6kms from the CBD & 45 minutes from Entebbe International Airport, Latitute 0 is the ideal stop-over before or after a gorilla trekking adventure.

This mid-sized luxury boutique hotel has 47 rooms & suites, bedecked with luxurious linens, sumptuous fabrics & furniture, & bespoke artworks.
Each room or suite has an en-suite bathroom with full sized bath & walk-in shower as well as fresh Ugandan coffee & French Presses.
The hotel features a wellness spa, gym & swimming pools, rooftop bar where sundowners can be enjoyed as well as private dining & entertaining spaces.

title: THE BOMA ENTEBBE
description:
The Boma Entebbe is set within lush tropical gardens in one of Entebbe’s best neighbourhoods.  
On your doorstep you will find the city’s golf course, beautiful botanical gardens & the Uganda Wildlife Education Centre.
Its unpretentious & down-to-earth atmosphere combined with a family-friendly swimming pool & kids play area makes this a wonderful choice for families.
With a convenient location close to Entebbe International Airport, The Boma Entebbe is the ideal stop-over before or after a gorilla trekking adventure.

There are 15 luxurious rooms at The Boma Entebbe, all individually decorated to reflect the African & European influences on Uganda.  
The room categories include double rooms, triple rooms & single rooms, each featuring an en-suite bathroom, WIFI & a private veranda.
The central area features a family-friendly swimming pool, restaurant with cocktail bar, craft shop, library & a children’s play area.

title: CHRISTIANA LODGE
description:
Christiana Lodge is a classic beach house situated only a 5-minute walk from the renowned Robberg Beach in the coastal town of Plettenberg Bay.
This west-facing Garden Route lodge offers individually-styled rooms with private decks & sensational sunsets.  
Owner-managed & run, Christiana Lodge is all about service where hands-on hosting & friendly staff display true South African hospitality.
The Garden Route is world-renowned for its outdoor activities, from seasonal whale watching to canopy tours, elephant encounters & forest walks.  In addition to providing an ideal base of exploration, Christiana Lodge is situated near a selection of blue flag beaches, making this an ideal choice for beach-lovers.

The beach house features 2 luxury rooms, 8 superior rooms & 1 deluxe room, each equipped with an en-suite bathroom.
The luxury rooms have private balconies with beautiful nature views as well as underfloor heating.  In addition, the slightly larger superior rooms boast spectacular views over either the wetland or ocean.  Some superior rooms also have a private deck & outdoor shower.  One of them has a private plunge pool & another a daybed for a child.  The deluxe room does not have a balcony but offers views of the pool & comes complete with a daybed.
Communal areas include a large deck with swimming pool & sun loungers as well as a comfortable lounge & dining area.

title: EMILY MOON RIVER LODGE
description:
Surrounded by indigenous vegetation, with views of the surrounding wetland, winding river & distant mountains, Emily Moon River Lodge in Plettenberg Bay offers a true nature experience.
The lodge overlooks the southern bank of the Bitou River & from its beautiful, contemporary rooms, guests can soak up sensational river views.
Emily Moon has a long list of activities on their recommendation list, including mountain biking, horse-riding, canoeing & scenic nature walks.
The lodge is small & intimate & has wonderfully quirky yet chic décor.  Their on-site restaurant serves an eclectic menu with a range of popular dishes.

Emily Moon River Lodge is made up of 6 deluxe luxury suites, 8 luxury suites & 2 family suites, featuring rare artefacts & found items collected from all over Africa & beyond. 
Each spacious suite comprises a well-appointed bathroom, a living area & an outdoor wooden deck.  
Guests can choose between 2 swimming pools that offer breathtaking views or visit the small bar that serves refreshing cocktails on the sundowner deck.

title: HEAD OVER HILLS
description:
Perched on the edge of the iconic Knysna Heads, the five-star Head Over Hills Luxury Retreat boasts spectacular views of the surrounding ocean & mountains.
This award-winning retreat has taken many prizes for its superb location, including the Prime Location Hotel in South Africa by the prestigious Haute Grandeur – indeed, a wonderful achievement.
With world-class views & luxurious interiors, Head Over Hills is the ideal choice for honeymooners or couples looking for a well-deserved vacation.  
Whether you want to explore the beautiful town of Knysna or just soak in the views from the deck or infinity pool, Head Over Hills will not disappoint.

Accommodation comprises 8 rooms: 4 suites & 4 deluxe rooms, all with beautiful sea views, private balconies, air conditioning & Nespresso machines.  
The retreat’s main area includes a comfortable lounge & dining area as well as a large deck with an infinity pool & sun loungers.  Uninterrupted views can be enjoyed from the deck - & trust us – it is quite the sight!

title: HOG HOLLOW COUNTRY LODGE
description:
Hog Hollow Country Lodge is situated in a private nature reserve near Plettenberg Bay - one of the Garden Route’s most beautiful beachside towns.  
The estate boasts magnificent views of the surrounding valleys & Tsitsikamma Mountains, & is situated alongside a central dam, creating a private oasis on the edge of an indigenous forest.
Hog Hollow is famous for its friendly, personalized service & warm hospitality.  From the moment you arrive, until the moment you leave – the staff is happy to go the extra mile, ensuring you the most memorable stay.
The chefs at Hog Hollow prepare delicious meals using only the freshest local produce.  Farmhouse breakfasts are served on the wooden deck overlooking the forest & dinners are a candle-lit affair with fine wine.

Hog Hollow Country Estate is made up of 13 suites & 3 loft suites, all equipped with an en-suite bathroom with a separate bath & shower.
Each suite is situated in the lush gardens surrounding the main lodge & features a lounge area, private wooden deck & cosy fireplace.  The loft suites are ideal for families since they consist of a master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom that is located upstairs & a downstairs lounge area that can accommodate 2 children on a double sleeper sofa.
Communal areas include a swimming pool with sun loungers offering breathtaking views over the valley & mountains, a reading room looking out over the forest & a Ficus Lounge where guests can enjoy bird watching.  There is also a boma where tasty nightcaps are enjoyed.

title: HUNTERS COUNTRY HOUSE
description:
Hunters Country House is an original thatched homestead, set among beautiful gardens, against the backdrop of the majestic Tsitsikamma Mountains in the heart of the Garden Route.  
This peaceful & tranquil retreat is the ideal place from which to explore the Garden Route as it is a short drive from Plettenberg Bay & the popular town of Knysna.
Hunters Country House is a member of the Relais & Chateaux group & provides exceptional service & attention to detail.  
Providing a homely atmosphere, Hunters welcomes children of all ages & has a recreation area, including a shallow pool, games room & thatched-covered sandpit, especially for children.

This old English country estate comprises 27 luxury suites, situated among beautifully manicured gardens.  They consist of 5 terrace rooms, 4 orchard suites, 12 garden suites, 3 family suites, 2 pool suites & 1 family pool suite.
These individual thatched-roof suites are comfortable & spacious – everything you would expect from a Relais & Chateaux property. All have secluded patios & gardens, while certain suites have private plunge pools.  
The terrace rooms are ideal for solo travellers & lead onto an outdoor patio near the main area & swimming pool.  Orchard suites are also privately appointed by the main pool complex. 
The garden cottages are located along winding paths through the garden & the 2-bedroom family suites are ideal for parents travelling with children.  The pool suites boast private pools - a wonderful addition to a Garden Route holiday.
On-site facilities include 2 restaurants, a library, bar, swimming pool, gym & Kids Club.

title: KANONKOP HOUSE
description:
The luxurious Kanonkop House is perched on a hill above the beautiful Garden Route town of Knysna & offers captivating views of the lagoon & the iconic Knysna Heads.
This well-appointed guesthouse is located near the centre of town & is, therefore, an ideal base from which to explore Knysna & the surrounding area of the Garden Route.  
Owner-managed & run, guests can be confident that they will receive impeccable, personalized service with great attention to detail while still maintaining a relaxed home-away-from-home atmosphere.

Kanonkop House features 3 lagoon suites, 2 garden suites & 2 penthouse suites.  All suites include air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.
Each of the lagoon suites has a private balcony or deck with beautiful views featuring the indigenous forest, the lagoon & the Knysna Heads to the Indian Ocean beyond.
The garden suites have large decks overlooking the swimming pool & garden with interrupted views of the lagoon in the distance.
Each penthouse suite offers panoramic views of the lagoon, a private deck or balcony, a sitting area & a beautiful en-suite bathroom with a view of the lagoon & Knysna Heads.
Facilities at Kanonkop House include a restaurant & elegant bar, a library, swimming pool, wellness spa & gym.

title: KNYSNA HOLLOW COUNTRY ESTATE
description:
Set in a tranquil country estate near Knysna Lagoon, the elegant Knysna Hollow Country Estate offers a relaxed space just minutes from the centre of this pretty seaside town.
The estate offers sensational views of the famous Knysna Heads, 2 large rocky headlands that stick out over the channel between the Indian Ocean & the Knysna Estuary.
This modern Cape Country Manor House offers the ideal base from which to explore Knysna & the surrounding area of the Garden Route, including its rich forests, endless lakes & gorgeous beaches.
Guests can anticipate authentic hospitality in a spacious & serene environment.  The restaurant, cocktail bar & sundeck offer lovely indoor & outdoor dining experiences.

Knysna Hollow Country Estate features 44 luxury garden suites situated in the indigenous gardens around 2 sparkling swimming pools.
Each room is decorated in a clean, contemporary style with a private garden-facing veranda where relaxing afternoons can be spent reading a book or gazing at the lush surroundings.
The estate is also home to a fitness centre & swimming pool.  Meals are served in the restaurant or outdoor deck while delicious cocktails can be enjoyed at the bar.

title: KURLAND
description:
Kurland is an elegant country hotel set on a private polo estate between Knysna & Plettenberg Bay along the renowned Garden Route.
Family-owned & run, Kurland is all about exceptional service, beautiful suites, sublime local cuisine & family-friendly activities, including horse-riding & quad biking on the estate.
With an ideal location in the heart of the Garden Route, guests will be close to some of the area’s top attractions, including The Elephant Sanctuary, Birds of Eden, Monkeyland & the beautiful Nature’s Valley with its scenic forest trails.
Families will fall in love with Kurland since there is ample space for the little ones to run around & a variety of exciting activities to choose from.  There is also a dedicated Kids Club area & a swimming pool.  Kids meals can also be arranged & trained nannies are also available.  
Children of all ages are welcome at Kurland.

Kurland has 12 tastefully decorated, spacious suites & can accommodate up to 48 people.  
The luxury & superior suites all have private loft rooms that are specially furnished for children with their own en-suite bathrooms.  The luxury suites have secluded courtyards & water features while the superior suites all have private pools, which enjoy magnificent views of the estate.
Communal areas include a polo pavilion complete with a restaurant, bar & children’s playroom.  There is also a wellness spa that offers a range of relaxing treatments.   The relaxing lounge, dining room with fireplace & outdoor patio area are ideal for relaxing & the swimming pool with sun loungers invite guests to relax after a day of exploration.

title: LEISURE ISLE LODGE
description:
Situated on a tiny island in Knysna Lagoon, right at the heart of the Garden Route, you will find Leisure Isle Lodge – a charming guesthouse that sits alongside cosy beach cottages.
Offering beautiful views of the Knysna Lagoon, the elegant restaurant & outdoor pool area is a wonderful place to relax in the sun after a day of exploration.
This intimate guesthouse offers great service, along with a friendly home-away-from-home atmosphere that attracts couples, friends & families alike.
Just across the road, you will find a lovely little stretch of beach – a serene slice of paradise that welcomes guests to stroll along its soft, powdery sand or take a refreshing dip in the warm, lagoon.

Small & intimate, Leisure Isle Lodge only offers 10 rooms & a penthouse, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
The rooms consist of garden or lagoon facing rooms, each beautifully decorated.  The penthouse boasts a private balcony overlooking the lagoon, a lounge & dining area with a fireplace as well as an open patio with lagoon views.
Leisure Isle Lodge has a lovely private swimming pool & a wellness spa as well as a stylish lounge & bar area that looks out over the Knysna Lagoon.  Their award-winning Daniela’s Restaurant is positioned overlooking Bollard Bay & the lagoon.

title: NR 5 BOUTIQUE ART HOTEL
description:
Nr 5 Boutique Art Hotel is set within an upscale neighbourhood in Port Elizabeth, an easy stroll from Summerstrand – one of the best beaches in the area.  
Small & intimate, this boutique hotel offers friendly & personalized service & a variety of modern facilities such as a wellness spa, a fitness centre & a restaurant serving fine cuisine.
This hotel offers relaxation for mind & body.  Guests can stroll through the landscaped gardens or along the beach – especially after a lengthy self-drive vacation along the scenic Garden Route.
Nr 5 Boutique Art Hotel is the perfect stop-over for guests who are travelling to Addo Elephant Park in the Eastern Cape or who are connecting with a flight back to Johannesburg or Cape Town.

Accommodation comprises 3 luxury suites, 3 business suites, 1 presidential suite & 1 three-bedroom villa.  
The spacious luxury suites feature a separate lounge & private garden while the business suites have their own balconies.  The presidential suite boasts a private lounge & terrace as well as an en-suite bathroom with a separate bath & shower. 
The villa consists of 3 en-suite bedrooms, a lounge & dining area, a fully furnished kitchen as well as a wooden deck with a swimming pool.
At the main lodge, you will find a restaurant, bar, gym, wellness spa & swimming pool.

title: PEZULA RESORT HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
Pezula Resort Hotel & Spa is an award-winning golf resort with a dramatic location set on a cliff overlooking the beautiful Knysna lagoon to the north & the Outeniqua Mountains in the distance.
The resort is home to an 18-hole Pezula Championship Golf Course & offers a range of other family-friendly activities like horse-riding, tennis, cycling, mountain biking while yachting, kayaking, diving & fishing can also be arranged.
Pezula’s exceptional on-site restaurants offer delicious cuisine that ranges from beach picnics to light meals & sophisticated dining.

Accommodation comprises 76 suites in total.  These include deluxe suites, luxury suites, superior suites, inter-leading family suites, 2-bedroom villas & an opulent presidential suite.
Deluxe suites boast private patios or balconies with garden views & cosy sitting areas while the larger luxury suites are located on the upper or lower levels & feature scenic golf course or garden views.
Superior suites have sitting areas & lagoon or golf course views while inter-leading family suites sleep 4 people in 2 bedrooms.  Two-bedroom villas have magnificent golf course & ocean views, private patios, plunge pools & separate living, dining & kitchen areas.  The opulent presidential suite offers only the best in 5-star luxury.
Resort facilities include a swimming pool, spa, bar, gym, library, restaurant & tennis court.

title: RADISSON BLU HOTEL PORT ELIZABETH
description:
The Radisson Blu Hotel Port Elizabeth is situated only 300 meters from the blue flag beaches of Algoa Bay – widely regarded as boasting some of the best beaches in the country & a paradise for watersport enthusiasts.
Port Elizabeth is more than just their beaches.  The seaside town is home to a variety of good restaurants, museums & monuments as well as a wonderful overnight destination after a Garden Route holiday or en-route to Addo Elephant Park.
Guests can enjoy rejuvenating treatments at the wellness spa or take a dip in the gorgeous swimming pool overlooking the beach.

The hotel comprises 173 rooms & suites, each with air-conditioning & en-suite bathroom.  
Superior rooms are comfortably furnished & have everything you need for a relaxing stay.  There are also superior ocean view rooms offering breathtaking views of the Indian Ocean & premier sea-facing rooms boasting more space as well as ocean views.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar & lounge as well as a wellness spa & beautiful swimming pool with glorious views of the beach.

title: TAMODI LODGE &amp; STABLES
description:
Tamodi Lodge enjoys an idyllic setting on a working equestrian farm within a private nature reserve just outside the sought-after seaside town of Plettenberg Bay.
Here, guests will enjoy jaw-dropping views of the surrounding mountains in a serene setting.  
Just around the corner & a short drive away, you will find Plettenberg Bay with its blue flag beaches & a long list of activities, including seasonal whale watching, water sports, golf & wine tasting.
The area is particularly good for hiking & mountain biking, so nature-lovers will feel like they are in paradise.
Since the lodge only has 7 rooms, it can be booked on an exclusive-use basis, making this a wonderful Garden Route retreat for families, couples or friends travelling together.

Tamodi comprises 7 luxury suites, each designed around a grand main house with a swimming pool.  Each suite has an en-suite bathroom with a separate bath & shower as well as an outdoor deck with seating, offering unspoilt views over the valley below the lodge.
Some suites also offer outdoor showers & private plunge pools – the ideal place to unwind after a day out exploring the Garden Route.
The main area includes 2 spacious lounges, a bar, a cosy library & a sparkling swimming pool.

title: THE PLETTENBERG
description:
Perched high on a rocky headland, overlooking the golden Formosa Beach in Plettenberg Bay, the sophisticated & intimate beach hotel promises captivating & uninterrupted views of the ocean below.
The Plettenberg is perfectly situated to some of the area’s best beaches, including the ever-popular Central Beach as well as blue flag Robberg Beach.  Excellent whale watching can be experienced here between August to December each year.
Apart from their award-winning seafood restaurant & stylish bar as well as an on-site wellness spa & 2 heated infinity pools, The Plettenberg also caters for younger guests.  Children can enjoy a range of exciting activities like bodyboarding, beach tennis, popcorn & movies or interactive cooking lessons with a friendly chef.  Babysitting is also available.

The Plettenberg offers a range of rooms, suites & villas.  
All rooms have air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.  The suites offer beautiful ocean views & the villas offer either 2 or 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, along with an open-plan living area, deck & private swimming pool.
Top-notch facilities at The Plettenberg include 2 heated infinity pools with views over the bay & its resident dolphins, a wellness spa offering a range of relaxing treatments as well as a restaurant, bar, library & fitness centre.

title: THE REX HOTEL
description:
Situated in Knysna’s trendy Grey Street – a thoroughfare lined with cafes, restaurants & boutiques, you will find The Rex Hotel.
Just around the corner, the Knysna Waterfront invites guests to browse, shop or dine to their hearts’ content & return to their quiet slice of paradise tucked away in a remote corner of this seaside town.
Their on-site restaurant serves mouth-watering breakfast options & delectable Mediterranean cuisine – the perfect dining option after a day of Garden Route exploration.

There are 56 rooms at The Rex Hotel, all reflecting an urban chic ambience, mixing contemporary & classic décor with cool colours & rich fabrics.
Each room features air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
On-site facilities include a sparkling swimming pool where lazy afternoons are often spent, as well as a restaurant that serves delicious cuisine.

title: THE TURNBINE BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
Located on Thesen Island in Knysna Lagoon, The Turbine Boutique Hotel is unique in every way.  This converted power station is now an upscale boutique hotel with a unique look & feel.  
All the original machinery has been integrated into the design of the hotel to remind guests of its glorious past.
With an exceptional on-site restaurant that serves fresh Knysna oysters, as well as a lovely viewing deck & Tapas Bar, The Turbine Boutique Hotel does not disappoint when it comes to dining.  
In fact, guests can also enjoy sundowner cruises on the hotel’s private pontoon boat while watching the sun sets over the quiet lagoon.

The Turbine Boutique Hotel features 17 standard rooms, 6 luxury rooms, 2 self-catering suites & a honeymoon suite.
The standard rooms include air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.  Each luxury room includes a relaxing lounge area while the honeymoon suite boasts a lounge & entertainment area as well as beautiful views over the Knysna Lagoon’s waterways.  The self-catering suites are similar to the honeymoon suite, but also include an open-plan kitchen.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar, library, gym, pool & wellness spa.

title: THE WINDERMERE
description:
Set in the upscale suburb of Humewood, close to the prestigious Humewood Golf Club & Port Elizabeth Airport, you will find The Windermere – a contemporary boutique hotel with direct access to King’s Beach.
The boutique hotel is within walking distance to the endless blue flag beaches & independent eateries, & The Boardwalk can also be found nearby.
Since there are only a small number of suites at The Windermere, personalized service & warm South African hospitality awaits.

There are 8 elegant suites, as well as 1 large suite with a second bedroom, which is ideal for families.  Each suite has air-conditioning, underfloor heating & an en-suite bathroom.
The main area is home to a private lounge, library, bar & outdoor patio with a swimming pool.  
Nearby, you will also find a gym, spa & golf course.

title: TSALA TREETOP LODGE
description:
