Tsala Treetop Lodge, as the name suggests, is located within a magnificent forest along South Africa’s ever-popular Garden Route.  
The Tsitsikamma Forest boasts beautiful nature walks & is a short drive away from Plettenberg Bay, where you can enjoy white, sandy beaches & outstanding restaurants.
Tsala is our childhood dream come true.  Set in a lush forest, exclusive treetop suites with private plunge pools offer jaw-dropping views over the beautiful surroundings.   
This is a honeymooner’s paradise.  Here at Tsala, couples will experience exceptional service, beautiful tree-house suites, utter privacy & relaxing in-room spa treatments.

Tsala Treetop Lodge has 10 luxury timber suites that are connected to the main area via elevated wooden walkways.
Each tree suite is equipped with a private viewing deck, plunge pool & lavish bathroom.  During winter, relax by the cosy fireplace while enjoying a glass of wine & in summer, sit on the deck & marvel at the fairytale views from the comfort of your tree suite.
Tsala guests can enjoy 24-hour room service, air-conditioning, double showers & private balconies.  
The main lodge features a comfortable lounge, dining room, restaurant, bar, wine cellar & swimming pool.  There is also a wellness spa set among beautiful gardens.

title: ATHOLPLACE HOUSE &amp; VILLA
description:
AtholPlace House & Villa is set in Johannesburg’s upscale neighbourhood of Sandton & offers 2 luxury exclusive-use options that are conveniently close to Nelson Mandela Square & OR Tambo International Airport.
Guests can choose between the 9-bedroom house or the 4-bedroom villa.  Both properties are sophisticated in design & provide a luxurious stay for the discerning traveller in search of privacy & seclusion.
A member of Relais & Chateaux, AtholPlace House & Villa come with a private chef, butler, host & housekeeping staff – ensuring the highest quality of service.  
Both properties feature a swimming pool, a private gym & beautiful, manicured gardens where al fresco dinners are served.  
Nearby, you will find many upscale malls & restaurants should guests choose to explore Johannesburg city & surrounds.

AtholPlace House is the bigger of the 2 properties & can sleep up to 18 guests in 9 elegant bedrooms.  The house also includes a lounge, a bar & library with a romantic fireplace, a temperature-controlled swimming pool, a gym & a lush garden to relax in.  
AtholPlace Villa can sleep 8 guests in 4 bedrooms in a home-away-from-home setting.  All bedrooms have access to a large, shared balcony offering a view of the private garden & pool.  Downstairs you will find a large living room with a separate television area, as well as a beautifully furnished dining room & a fully equipped kitchen & small study.  The large garden features a temperature-controlled pool, a fire pit boma & shady trees, perfect for alfresco lunches.  
Both properties can be booked on a bed & breakfast, fully inclusive or all-inclusive basis.  The all-inclusive basis also includes the AtholPlace guide & vehicle for touring Johannesburg City.

title: D’OREALE GRANDE
description:
Situated conveniently close to OR Tambo International Airport, The D’Oreale Grande is a 5-star Las Vegas-style casino resort that offers round-the-clock entertainment right on your doorstep.
Guests staying at this world-class hotel will have direct access to the Emperor’s Palace with its many restaurants, theatre shows, boutique shops & clubs.
Hotel guests will also be able to make use of their complimentary shuttle service to & from the airport – a welcome treat after a long-haul flight.
For those wishing to escape the hustle & bustle of the Emperor’s Palace, the wellness spa is the perfect place to get rejuvenated before your next flight.

The Roman-inspired interior at D’Oreale Grande offers guests a truly glamorous stay. 
Guests can choose between classic rooms, deluxe rooms, superior rooms & club floor superior rooms.  All 196 air-conditioned rooms are beautifully decorated & have en-suite bathrooms.
The hotel features a restaurant that serves delicious cuisine as well as a cocktail bar & lounge where pre-dinner drinks are enjoyed.  Guests can cool off in the hotel’s swimming pool or work up a sweat in the 24-hour gym.  Their wellness day spa offers a range of relaxing treatments – the perfect remedy for jet lag.

title: FAIRLAWNS BOUTIQUE HOTEL
description:
With an ideal setting in Johannesburg’s affluent neighbourhood of Sandton, Fairlawns Boutique Hotel is an opulent 5-star retreat that offers discerning guests a tranquil oasis amongst the glittering lights of the city.
Set in a beautiful, manicured estate, the award-winning Fairlawns Boutique Hotel is ideally located to explore South Africa’s ‘City of Gold’ as Johannesburg is known.  Nearby, you will find top-class shopping, museums, galleries & trendy eateries.  
Their on-site Balinese spa offers a range of innovative treatments – the perfect place to relax after a long-haul flight.  Service is of utmost importance at Fairlawns, so guests can expect to receive the highest level of hospitality.

Accommodation at Fairlawns is lavish & comprises 20 grand chateau suites, 12 courtyard suites, 6 villa suites, a two-bedroom treehouse studio, a two-bedroom Maison Spa Suite & a three-bedroom villa.
The grand chateau suites are individually decorated & feature comfortable sofas & sandstone fireplaces.  Graced by a formal garden, the courtyard suites have high ceilings, fireplaces & spacious bathrooms with separate baths & showers.
Some of the villa suites have balconies, while others open onto an oak-shaded terrace.  All villa suites have underfloor heating in the bathrooms & fireplaces.  The 2-bedroom treehouse studio has been designed with families in mind.  It has a state-of-the-art kitchen as well as a lounge & dining room.
The 2-bedroom Maison Spa Suite consists of a study, kitchenette, dining room & lounge, as well as a balcony overlooking the gardens & pool.  The private 3-bedroom villa boasts Persian carpets, a heated pool & an alfresco lounge & a dining area.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, bar, library, gym, swimming pool & spa.

title: FOUR SEASONS HOTEL THE WESTCLIFF
description:
Set in one of Johannesburg’s most exclusive & affluent residential enclaves, the Four Seasons Hotel The Westcliff boasts an elevated position that offers breathtaking views of Johannesburg’s tree canopy & upscale neighbourhoods below.
A stone’s throw away, you will find the upscale shopping district of Sandton & the Johannesburg Zoo, while OR Tambo International Airport is only a short drive away.
This refined hotel is renowned for its fine dining & full butler service, so guests can expect only the best in service & cuisine.  
Boasting a wellness spa, a fitness centre, 5 on-site restaurants & 2 heated swimming pools, Four Seasons guests will have ample choice in facilities & activities.

Surrounded by 2 beautiful gardens & lush emerald lawns, the hotel provides a tranquil oasis in this vibrant ‘City of Gold.’
Four Seasons Hotel The Westcliff offers 117 rooms & suites inspired by contemporary Africa, all featuring private terraces.  There are also family suites available for parents travelling with children.
The hotel offers floodlit tennis courts & a gym with a team of personal trainers as well as a 9-room spa & 2 heated swimming pools.  The spa offers a range of relaxing treatments – the perfect place to recover from jet lag.  Delicious cuisine is served at their 5 on-site restaurants, so guests will have a variety of dining options.

title: INTERCONTINENTAL HOTEL
description:
Located just a few steps outside OR Tambo’s International Arrivals Hall, the Intercontinental Hotel offers guests the perfect blend between luxury & comfort.
Standing proud, just shy of 70 meters from the airport building, the Intercontinental Hotel is – without a doubt – Johannesburg’s best option for an overnight stay.  Regardless of your arrival time, there is no need to wait for a taxi or sit in traffic – after only a few steps, you will reach your destination.
The hotel boasts a wellness spa, fitness centre & a heated swimming pool for those wishing to get rejuvenated after a long-haul flight.
Dining is important at the Intercontinental Hotel.  Delicious breakfasts are served along with African-fushion cuisine at their on-site restaurant.  In-room dining is also available.

The hotel is home to 108 deluxe rooms, 27 executive rooms, 2 presidential suites & 1 disabled room.
The well-appointed deluxe rooms are tastefully decorated with subtle influences of Africa.  These rooms have spacious showers, blackout curtains & soundproofing to ensure a night of relaxation.  
Executive rooms occupy corners of the hotel providing impressive views & ample natural light.  En-suite bathrooms have luxurious showers with massage showerheads to ensure the utmost comfort.  
Families who request inter-leading rooms can book an executive room & deluxe room next door as one unit.  Due to minimal inter-leading rooms, specifying this need is important.  The 2 presidential suites are located on the 7th floor & boast beautiful views.  
Hotel facilities include a restaurant, cocktail bar, gym, spa & swimming pool.

title: MICHELANGELO TOWERS
description:
The sophisticated Michelangelo Towers is situated in trendy Sandton – one of Johannesburg most affluent areas.
Offering panoramic views of the Sandton skyline & the distant Magaliesburg Mountains, the hotel is the perfect base from which to explore the vibrant ‘City of Gold.’
Within a 2-minute walk, you will find the popular Nelson Mandela Square – a hive of world-class shopping & fine restaurants – as well as other major city attractions.
The hotel boasts a fitness centre for those wishing to stay active on holiday & the indoor & outdoor swimming pools are ideal spots to relax after a day of city exploration & shopping.

Michelangelo Towers features a range of different suites, each beautifully designed with luxury & comfort in mind.
There are one-bedroom suites, two-bedroom suites, a 3-bedroom presidential suite as well as one-bedroom & two-bedroom apartments.
Each suite features an open-plan living & dining area & each apartment has a dining & sitting area as well as a kitchen.  Hotel facilities include a restaurant, cocktail bar, gym, spa & 2 swimming pools.

title: MOUNT GRACE HOTEL &amp; SPA
description:
Perched high in the Magaliesberg Mountains lies Mount Grace House & Spa, a luxurious retreat set in a private country estate.
Surrounded by beautiful, English gardens, the property has a rich & well-defined sense of tradition & is situated only an hour’s drive from Johannesburg.
On-site, you will find an award-winning spa located on a hilltop, a modern gym & 4 on-site restaurants serving a variety of options from full English breakfasts & light lunches to country-style buffets & gourmet fine dining.

Surrounded by bushveld, this leading Magaliesberg hotel offers a choice of 121 stylish & spacious suites that are discreetly positioned in gorgeous, lush gardens.
Rooms have in-room climate control & elegant bathrooms with large showers & huge indulgent baths.  There are also well-appointed 2-bedroom units, an ideal choice for families with young children.  The hotel also boasts romantic villas with panoramic views & private plunge pools.
Hotel facilities include an 18-room spa offering a full range of treatments as well as a bush bath, located away from the main building.  The spa also features a jacuzzi, waterfall & flotation pool that are set in the hydrotherapy spa garden.
There is also a library, a swimming pool, a tennis court & a modern gym where guests can stay active as well as 4 restaurants serving a variety of delicious cuisine.

title: RADISSON BLU HOTEL SANDTON
description:
The Radisson Blu Hotel Sandton boasts a spectacular location in Johannesburg’s trendiest area & offers an ideal base from which to explore the vibrant ‘City of Gold.
The stylish hotel boasts captivating views of the bustling city as well as ultra-modern facilities, including a large swimming pool with stunning views, a wellness spa offering a range of relaxing treatments & a fitness centre where guests can get their heart rate going before the start of their day.
Nearby, you will find a wide variety of restaurants to choose from, along with a hive of boutique shops & some of Johannesburg main attractions.

The Radisson Blu Hotel Sandton features 302 rooms with air-conditioning & en-suite bathrooms.
There are standard rooms with city views, superior rooms with pool views & executive rooms with park views & private lounge access.
Guests can soak up the magnificent views on the sun deck which wraps around the large swimming pool on the 8th floor of the hotel.  The wellness spa offers a range of holistic body & beauty treatments & the state-of-the-art gym is the perfect place for active guests to work up a sweat.
There is also an elegant wine & bar lounge where pre-dinner drinks or delicious cocktails can be enjoyed & on the 9th floor, you will find an outdoor swimming pool & deck offering captivating views.

title: ROVOS RAIL
description:
Rovos Rail offers a luxury train holiday like no other.  
Apart from owning & operating the most luxurious trains in the world, Rovos Rail offers guests a variety of train journeys - each ranging from 2 nights to 2 weeks.
Short train trips include travelling from Cape Town to Pretoria or north to the majestic Victoria Falls in Zimbabwe.  The longest & most famous route is an epic rail journey that starts in Cape Town & passes through some of Africa’s most magnificent scenery to Dar es Salaam.
Elegant train carriages, spacious suites & fine dining is what the Rovos Rail journeys are all about.  For many guests, a real highlight of their Rovos experience is the 4-course suave dinners – a jacket-&-tie affair that never disappoints.
Everything is included in a Rovos Rail journey – all meals, drinks, snacks, high teas & even off-train activities & excursions, so guests can sit back & relax in style.
Rohan Vos started Rovos Rail in 1989 (hence the name) & is still very much involved in the company, endeavouring to personally welcome every guest arriving & departing from Rovos’ private train station in Pretoria.

Rovos Rail boasts 3 suite types that are the perfect balance between vintage carriages & modern luxury.  Pullman suites are 7 sq meters, Deluxe suites are 10 sq meters & Royal Suites are 16 sq meters.
All suites have fittings & furnishings of the highest standard & include en-suite bathrooms with a shower, toilet, basin & bath (Royal suites only).
The observation car seats 32 passengers & comprises an open-air balcony, big pictures windows, a bar, sofas & booths.

title: THE MASLOW
description:
Located in Sandton, Johannesburg’s most affluent neighbourhood, The Maslow offers beautiful views over the vibrant city as well a wide range of modern facilities.
The hotel features a top-notch spa where relaxing treatments can be enjoyed & a state-of-the-art gym where active guests can work up a sweat before they start their day.
Guests can enjoy a complimentary shuttle service to Sandton city for an afternoon of high-end shopping or dine at one of the city’s world-class restaurants.  
Meals at the hotel are fantastic.  A la carte breakfasts are served each morning while aromatic barista-made coffee can be enjoyed at their urban bistro.  Lunch at the lounge bar is a relaxed affair while evenings are all about 3-course dinners paired with excellent wines.

The Maslow is home to 281 rooms & suites, each equipped with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.  
Some rooms have balconies, some have a separate bath & shower while others have only a shower.  The suites are slightly larger & features lounge & dining spaces.     
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a state-of-the-art gym, a wellness spa & a swimming pool.

title: THE MICHELANGELO HOTEL
description:
The luxurious Michelangelo Hotel is set in Nelson Mandel Square at the heart of Sandton, Johannesburg’s most affluent neighbourhood.   
Offering direct access to world-class shopping & restaurants, the hotel is the perfect base from which to explore the vibrant ‘City of Gold.’
Families will feel comfortable at The Michelangelo Hotel, since suites are extremely spacious & the hotel is situated near the Gautrain’s airport express service.
Guests who are looking for a relaxing stay will enjoy the heated indoor pool as well as the steam bath, wellness spa & gym.

The Michelangelo Hotel features a range of different rooms & suites, each beautifully designed with luxury & comfort in mind.
There are 219 deluxe & superior rooms, 23 executive & premier suites & 2 presidential suites.  
The superior rooms & deluxe rooms consist of a bedroom & lounge area.  The superior rooms’ bedroom & lounge areas are on one level & can fit an extra bed or cot while the deluxe room is a split-level unit.
Executive rooms are open-plan in design & the premier suites have doors between the bedroom & lounge areas, giving them a more private feel.
The presidential suites overlook Nelson Mandela Square, have inter-leading doors to a second bedroom & feature a dining room, lounge & kitchenette with a butler.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a heated indoor pool, a wellness spa, a gym & a library.

title: THE PEECH HOTEL
description:
The Peech Hotel offers a boutique-style experience in the heart of Melrose, one of Johannesburg’s most leafy & affluent areas.  
With Sandton around the corner, guests will have quick access to the city’s glamorous shopping, high-end restaurants & museums, making this an ideal base from which to explore the vibrant city of Johannesburg.
Ideal for an overnight stay, The Peech offers spacious suites with heavenly rain-showers, a swimming pool surrounded by manicured gardens & even a rotating art & photography exhibition for art-lovers.
Their charming champagne bar offers delicious pre-dinner cocktails & delectable cuisine is served at their sophisticated bistro.

The Peech Hotel offers 5 classic rooms, 5 luxury rooms, 2 peech suites & a 2-bedroom presidential villa.
The classic rooms boast en-suite bathrooms with both shower & bath as well as private patios offering views over the garden & pool.  Each luxury room has glass doors that open onto a large, private terrace or patio as well as a well-appointed bathroom with a large walk-in rain shower.
The peech suites are the most spacious & feature extra-large bathrooms, open-plan living spaces, patios or private garden terraces with views over the heated pool or landscaped garden as well as hanging pod chairs for further relaxation.
The two-bedroom peech villa offers 2 en-suite bathrooms, a central lounge area & an outdoor patio with a water feature.  The master bedroom boasts a free-standing bath & the second bedroom has a large walk-in shower.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a library, a swimming pool & a gym.

title: THE RESIDENCE JOHANNESBURG
description:
Houghton is Johannesburg’s most affluent neighbourhood & it is here where The Residence has made a name for itself as one of the best boutique hotels in the city.
Sophisticated & elegant in every way, discerning guests will enjoy The Residence’ impeccable service, beautifully landscaped gardens & culinary delights, including the finest wine from their well-stocked wine cellar.
Their stylish rooftop bar offers breathtaking sunsets & on-site you will find a private gym, spa, tennis courts & swimming pools where guests can relax & get rejuvenated.  
Avid golfers can enjoy a round of golf at the nearby Houghton Golf Course & a mere 10-minutes away, guests can experience world-class shopping & fine dining in trendy Sandton.

Accommodation at The Residence includes a range of elegant rooms & suites, each with air-conditioning & an en-suite bathroom.
The luxury rooms & luxury suites have underfloor heating as well as additional outdoor showers & baths.  Some also have outdoor jacuzzis.  
The Madiba luxury suite & penthouse luxury suite have separate lounge & dining areas as well as a rooftop deck area with an outdoor shower & jacuzzi.
The pool villa is situated on the ground floor, overlooking the gardens & features a heated plunge pool & fireplace.  Each one-bedroom suite offers a separate lounge, a veranda overlooking the garden & pool & a jacuzzi with pool loungers.  
There is also a 5-bedroom villa that can be booked out on an exclusive-use basis.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a library, a swimming pool, a wellness spa & a gym.

title: THE SAXON HOTEL
description:
The award-winning Saxon Hotel in Johannesburg has famously hosted former president & Nobel Laureate Nelson Mandela, so it is not surprising that this sophisticated establishment offers only the best in South African hospitality.
In addition to The Saxon’s impeccable service, the hotel is also a member of Chaine des Rotisseurs – an International Association of Gastronomy & the world’s oldest & most prestigious food & wine society who strive to guarantee guests world-class international dining.
Guests can expect only the highest level of luxury.  From private villas with plunge pools & an international art collection to butler services & pillow menus – The Saxon has it all.
Their wellness studio offers a wide range of relaxing treatments & guests can take a stroll in the lush & beautiful gardens.

The Saxon features a range of beautiful suites.  These include 20 luxury suites, 21 villa luxury suites, 3 presidential suites, 8 villa presidential suites, a Nelson Mandela platinum suite & 3 Saxon luxury villas.
The luxury suites have open-plan lounge & dining areas.  In addition, the villa luxury suites have private decks leading out into the lush gardens.  The presidential suites also have a kitchen & balcony with gorgeous views of the Johannesburg skyline while the villa presidential suites have access to a terrace with a private plunge pool.
The Nelson Mandela Suite also has a lounge, dining area & kitchen – but in addition, also features a second en-suite bedroom & steam room as well as views over the garden & pool terrace.  This suite comes with a dedicated butler.  The Saxon luxury villas offer the best in luxury, comprising a lounge & dining space, a breakfast area & bar with a dedicated butler & chef as well as a terrace with a private plunge pool.
Hotel facilities include a restaurant & bar, a library, a swimming pool, a wellness spa & a gym.
